Song.title: Cornerstone
Song.copyright: Edward Mote | Eric Liljero | Jonas Myrin | Reuben Morgan | William Batchelder Bradbury Â© 2011 Hillsong Music Publishing (Admin. by EMI Christian Music Publishing)

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [D | D | Bm | Bm | G | A]
Verse 1: [D] My hope is built on nothing less [G] Than Jesus' blood and r[A]ighteousness [Bm] I dare not trust the s[Bm/A]weetest frame [G] But wholly t[A]rust in Je [D]- sus' Name (REPEAT)
Chorus: [D/F#]Christ al[G]one, C[Bm]ornerst[A]one [D/F#]Weak made s[G]trong in the S[Bm]aviour's l[A]ove [D/F#]Through the s[G]torm [Bm]He is L[A]ord Lord of [D]all
Verse 2: [D] When darkness seems to hide His face [G] I rest on His unch[A]anging grace [Bm] In every high and st[Bm/A]ormy gale [G] My anchor h[A]olds within [D] the veil [G] My anchor h[A]olds within [D] the veil
{new_page} {key:G} Verse 3: [D] When He shall come with trumpet sound [G] Oh may I then in [A]Him be found [Bm] Dressed in His righteous[Bm/A]ness alone [G] Faultless s[A]tand before [D] the throne [G] Faultless s[A]tand before [D] the throne
{key:G} Chorus: [E/G#]Christ al[A]one, C[C#m]ornerst[B]one [E/G#]Weak made s[A]trong in the S[C#m]aviour's l[B]ove [E/G#]Through the s[A]torm [C#m]He is L[B]ord Lord of [E]all
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 my hope is built on nothing less than jesus blood and righteousness i dare not trust the sweetest frame but wholly trust in je sus name repeat chorus christ alone cornerstone weak made strong in the saviours love through the storm he is lord lord of all verse 2 when darkness seems to hide his face i rest on his unchanging grace in every high and stormy gale my anchor holds within the veil my anchor holds within the veil verse 3 when he shall come with trumpet sound oh may i then in him be found dressed in his righteousness alone faultless stand before the throne faultless stand before the throne chorus christ alone cornerstone weak made strong in the saviours love through the storm he is lord lord of all

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C | C | Am | Am | F | G]
Verse 1: [C] My hope is built on nothing less [F] Than Jesus' blood and r[G]ighteousness [Am] I dare not trust the s[Am/G]weetest frame [F] But wholly t[G]rust in Je [C]- sus' Name (REPEAT)
Chorus: [C/E]Christ al[F]one, C[Am]ornerst[G]one [C/E]Weak made s[F]trong in the S[Am]aviour's l[G]ove [C/E]Through the s[F]torm [Am]He is L[G]ord Lord of [C]all
Verse 2: [C] When darkness seems to hide His face [F] I rest on His unch[G]anging grace [Am] In every high and st[Am/G]ormy gale [F] My anchor h[G]olds within [C] the veil [F] My anchor h[G]olds within [C] the veil
Verse 3: [C] When He shall come with trumpet sound [F] Oh may I then in [G]Him be found [Am] Dressed in His righteous[Am/G]ness alone [F] Faultless s[G]tand before [C] the throne
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 my hope is built on nothing less than jesus blood and righteousness i dare not trust the sweetest frame but wholly trust in je sus name repeat chorus christ alone cornerstone weak made strong in the saviours love through the storm he is lord lord of all verse 2 when darkness seems to hide his face i rest on his unchanging grace in every high and stormy gale my anchor holds within the veil my anchor holds within the veil verse 3 when he shall come with trumpet sound oh may i then in him be found dressed in his righteousness alone faultless stand before the throne

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [D | D | Bm | Bm | G | A]
Verse 1: [D] My hope is built on nothing less [G] Than Jesus' blood and r[A]ighteousness [Bm] I dare not trust the s[Bm/A]weetest frame [G] But wholly t[A]rust in Je [D]- sus' Name (REPEAT)
Chorus: [D/F#]Christ al[G]one, C[Bm]ornerst[A]one [D/F#]Weak made s[G]trong in the S[Bm]aviour's l[A]ove [D/F#]Through the s[G]torm [Bm]He is L[A]ord Lord of [D]all
Verse 2: [D] When darkness seems to hide His face [G] I rest on His unch[A]anging grace [Bm] In every high and st[Bm/A]ormy gale [G] My anchor h[A]olds within [D] the veil [G] My anchor h[A]olds within [D] the veil
{new_page} {key:E} Verse 3: [E] When He shall come with trumpet sound [A] Oh may I then in [B]Him be found [C#m] Dressed in His righteous[C#m/B]ness alone [A] Faultless s[B]tand before [E] the throne [A] Faultless s[B]tand before [E] the throne
Chorus: [E/G#]Christ al[A]one, C[C#m]ornerst[B]one [E/G#]Weak made s[A]trong in the S[C#m]aviour's l[B]ove [E/G#]Through the s[A]torm [C#m]He is L[B]ord Lord of [E]all
{key:F#} Chorus: [A/B]On [E]Christ the so[E/G#]lid [A]rock I stand All [E]other ground is [C#m]sinking [B]sand [E/G#]All [A]other [E/G#]ground [C#m/F#] is [B]sinking [E]sand.
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 my hope is built on nothing less than jesus blood and righteousness i dare not trust the sweetest frame but wholly trust in je sus name repeat chorus christ alone cornerstone weak made strong in the saviours love through the storm he is lord lord of all verse 2 when darkness seems to hide his face i rest on his unchanging grace in every high and stormy gale my anchor holds within the veil my anchor holds within the veil verse 3 when he shall come with trumpet sound oh may i then in him be found dressed in his righteousness alone faultless stand before the throne faultless stand before the throne chorus christ alone cornerstone weak made strong in the saviours love through the storm he is lord lord of all chorus on christ the solid rock i stand all other ground is sinking sand all other ground is sinking sand
